PHRASE.LANG: Misión de entrenamiento de la BSAA
Misión de entrenamiento de la BSAA
[CROSS] レイナードに話しかける
Misión de entrenamiento de la BSAA
町の中に隠された、昆虫シリーズを制限時間以内に\n探し出しレイナードに報告しよう。\n隊員同士で連絡を取りあい、最短クリアを目指せ。
Find all the insects hidden throughout the town within 3 minutes. Talk to the butcher after finding them all. Try working with other agents to complete the task as quickly as possible.

Trouvez tous les insectes cachés dans la ville en moins de 3 minutes. Parlez au boucher quand vous les aurez trouvés. Essayez de collaborer avec les autres agents pour compléter cette tâche le plus vite possible.

Finden Sie alle in der Stadt versteckten Insekten innerhalb von 3 Minuten. Sprechen Sie mit dem Metzger, nachdem Sie sie gefunden haben. Arbeiten Sie mit anderen Agenten zusammen, um die Aufgabe so schnell wie möglich zu absolvieren.
Trova tutti gli insetti nascosti nel villaggio entro tre minuti. Parla al macellaio dopo averli trovati tutti. Cerca di lavorare con gli altri agenti per completare l'incarico il prima possibile.
Encuentra los insectos escondidos por toda la ciudad en menos de 3 minutos. Cuando termines habla con el carnicero. Intenta trabajar en equipo con otros agentes para terminar lo antes posible.
Find all the insects hidden throughout the town within 3 minutes. Talk to the butcher after finding them all. Try working with other agents to complete the task as quickly as possible.
Find all the insects hidden throughout the town within 3 minutes. Talk to the butcher after finding them all. Try working with other agents to complete the task as quickly as possible.
Find all the insects hidden throughout the town within 3 minutes. Talk to the butcher after finding them all. Try working with other agents to complete the task as quickly as possible.
Find all the insects hidden throughout the town within 3 minutes. Talk to the butcher after finding them all. Try working with other agents to complete the task as quickly as possible.
Find all the insects hidden throughout the town within 3 minutes. Talk to the butcher after finding them all. Try working with other agents to complete the task as quickly as possible.
残り%ARG%秒で開始されます
レイナードだ、話は聞いている。\nお前が噂のBSAA部隊の新米か。\n今日は何をしにきた？
So you're the new BSAA agent I heard about.\nWhat do you want?
C'est donc toi le nouvel agent du BSAA dont j'ai entendu parler.\nQu'est-ce que tu veux ?
So, Sie sind also der neue BSAA-Agent, von dem ich gehört habe.\nWas wollen Sie?
E così tu saresti il nuovo agente della BSAA di cui ho sentito parlare.\nCosa vuoi?
Así que tú eres ese agente de la BSAA de quien he oído hablar.\n¿Qué quieres?
So you're the new BSAA agent I heard about.\nWhat do you want?
So you're the new BSAA agent I heard about.\nWhat do you want?
So you're the new BSAA agent I heard about.\nWhat do you want?
So you're the new BSAA agent I heard about.\nWhat do you want?
So you're the new BSAA agent I heard about.\nWhat do you want?

まずは実力を見せてもらおうか？
約束のモノはそれからだ。
町の中に隠された”昆虫シリーズ”を持ってきたら認めてやる。
できるだけ早く探し出すんだ！
You know, I need to see how good you are. There are insects hidden around the town. Find them and bring them to me. Work with whomever you want, just be quick about it!
Il faut que je t'évalue. Il y a des insectes cachés dans la ville, trouve-les et amène-les-moi. Travaille avec qui tu veux, mais fais vite !
Nun ja, ich muss wissen, wie gut Sie sind. In der Stadt sind Insekten versteckt. Finden Sie sie und bringen Sie sie zu mir. Arbeiten Sie mit anderen Leuten zusammen, aber seien Sie schnell!
Sai, devo vedere quanto sei bravo. Ci sono insetti nascosti in tutto il villaggio. Trovali e portameli. Lavora con chi ti pare, ma ricordati di fare in fretta.
Mira, necesito saber de qué eres capaz. Hay una serie de insectos escondidos por toda la ciudad. Encuéntralos y tráemelos. ¡Trabaja con quien te dé la gana pero date prisa!
You know, I need to see how good you are. There are insects hidden around the town. Find them and bring them to me. Work with whomever you want, just be quick about it!
You know, I need to see how good you are. There are insects hidden around the town. Find them and bring them to me. Work with whomever you want, just be quick about it!

You know, I need to see how good you are. There are insects hidden around the town. Find them and bring them to me. Work with whomever you want, just be quick about it!
噂どおり、相当やりこんでいるようだな、部屋の奥に入りな！
I'm impressed. You live up to your reputation.\nGo on inside!
Impressionnant. Tu es digne de ton réputation.\nEntre !
Ich bin beeindruckt. Sie werden Ihrem Ruf gerecht.\nGehen Sie rein!
I'm impressed. You live up to your reputation.\nGo on inside!
I'm impressed. You live up to your reputation.\nGo on inside!
I'm impressed. You live up to your reputation.\nGo on inside!
I'm impressed. You live up to your reputation.\nGo on inside!

Get out of here already.\nYour mission's starting.
Ok, fuori di qui.\nLa missione sta per iniziare.
Largo de aquí.\nTu misión ya ha empezado.
Get out of here already.\nYour mission's starting.

さすがだな！いい洞察力を持っている。\n約束のモノだ、確認してくれ。
Not bad.\nAnd here's a little something for you for the effort.
Pas mal.\nVoici un petit quelque chose pour tes efforts.
Nicht schlecht.\nHier ist eine Kleinigkeit für Ihre Mühen.
Non male.\nEcco un pensierino per lo sforzo.
No está mal.\nAquí tienes una pequeña recompensa a tu esfuerzo.
Not bad.\nAnd here's a little something for you for the effort.

時間切れだ、腕を磨いてもう一度チャレンジしてくれ。\nパートナーとの連携が重要だ。
Time's up!\nYou still have a lot to learn, like how to work well with others for starters.
Temps écoulé !\nTu as encore beaucoup à apprendre, comme par exemple travailler en équipe.
Die Zeit ist um!\nSie müssen dazulernen - beispielsweise wie man gut mit anderen zusammenarbeitet.
Tempo scaduto!\nHai ancora tanto da imparare, come ad esempio il saper lavorare con gli altri ad esempio.
¡Se acabó el tiempo!\nAún tienes mucho que aprender, como por ejemplo el trabajar en equipo.

Fine. Maybe I'll see you around.
Bene. Magari ci si becca in giro.
Bien. Quizás nos veamos por aquí.

いらっしゃい！\nみやげ物を販売中だ、見ていってくれよ

Willkommen! Willkommen! \nIch habe hier ein paar nette Dinge zum Verkauf! Sehen Sie sich einfach mal um!
